album.title: It's Dark And Hell Is Hot

track.name: Damien
comments: did this song begin the tradition of dialogues with the devil in rap songs? either way, definitely one of the best...
My name is D like you, but my friends call me Damien.
Ugh, Give me the Original Uncut Version... I get the point tho.
the snake the rat the cat the dog
in a fog in a fog...living in a fog
no censorship on the version I heard! raw and uncut like it should be!
it's okay, DMX doesn't deserve to be un-cut, still can't believe he's dumb enough to try to impersonate an FBI agent.... tisk tisk tisk
yeah no shit wats up play the fuckin real muzic!!!!!!
Whats up with all the censored music on Last.fm...its F*cking BullSh!t...Please give us non-censored music!
I agree with babygurl14444, DMX should drop some more beats. I've for the most part, liked all of his songs except the Tear it Up song... I've heard all the albums.
